Description: Rim and body sherd (mended from two fragments) of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; trace of two added white bands; exterior: band of dots around rim, reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 20.18)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0979) (phase 2)
